utils


misc macros


ame_check_filename_duplicates

macro(ame_check_filename_duplicates p_folder)
type: Cmake macro
description: check if folder contains two files with the same name

ame_add_utest

macro(ame_add_utest p_targetName)
type: Cmake macro
description: add a unit test as POST-BUILD command

ame_embed_file

macro(ame_embed_file p_targetName p_inputfile p_outputDir p_symbol p_mode)
type: Cmake macro
description: embed a file and add it to target

ame_embed_bitmap_fonts

macro(ame_embed_bitmap_fonts p_targetName p_folder)
type: Cmake macro
description: embed a folder of .bitmapfont files

ame_embed_images

macro(ame_embed_images p_targetName p_folder)
type: Cmake macro
description: embed a folder of images

ame_add_copy_file

macro(ame_add_copy_file p_targetName p_file p_destination)
type: Cmake macro
description: add a PRE-BUILD command to copy a file

ame_add_create_directory

macro(ame_add_create_directory p_targetName p_dir)
type: Cmake macro
description: add a PRE-BUILD command to create a directory

ame_add_dir_copy

macro(ame_add_dir_copy p_targetName p_source p_dest)
type: Cmake macro
description: add a PRE-BUILD command to copy a directory

ame_add_companion_files

macro(ame_add_companion_files p_target)
type: Cmake macro
description: create commands to copy companion files in targat binary dir

ame_check_companion_elements

macro(ame_check_companion_elements p_target p_searchTarget)
type: Cmake macro
description: add companion elements from target dependencies

ame_output_copy_file

macro(ame_output_copy_file p_targetName p_file)
type: Cmake macro
description: add commands to copy a file in target output directory

ame_output_copy_files

macro(ame_output_copy_files p_targetName p_files)
type: Cmake macro
description: add commands to copy a list of files to target output directory

ame_output_copy_dir

macro(ame_output_copy_dir p_targetName p_dir)
type: Cmake macro
description: add commands to copy a directory in target output directory
